pullrequest.title: Use SimpleWrapper for more component types

content.raw:
Note that putting it all in one header increases the number of headers pulled in from SDF. I like the separation because you don't pay for what you don't use, but I can see the convenience in having a single header that includes it all. How about adding an extra `Components.hh` header that includes all of the others?

(Note that the exact type of components is still an open question and this will all most likely change)
content.html:
Note that putting it all in one header increases the number of headers pulled in from SDF. I like the separation because you don't pay for what you don't use, but I can see the convenience in having a single header that includes it all. How about adding an extra Components.hh header that includes all of the others?

(Note that the exact type of components is still an open question and this will all most likely change)
